snippet.title: Results of the demo are in… | Devlog
snippet.description:
I got into a fight with a bandaid. Let’s talk about how the demo has been received, updates I’ve made and how that works with all the store fronts I’m targeting.

Also, let’s check out a cool indie game!

EDIT: I don't want to re-record this video but the 90% play to wishlist conversion may not be accurate. When speaking I didn't take into account the variables of those who only wishlisted AND downloaded, not played, and those that may have wishlisted without doing any. 

► Epic: [https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/we-are-not-alone-demo-7c9a44](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/we-are-not-alone-demo-7c9a44)

► Steam: [https://store.steampowered.com/app/2249440/We_Are_Not_Alone/](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2249440/We_Are_Not_Alone/)

► Itch: [https://stasisboothgames.itch.io/we-are-not-alone](https://stasisboothgames.itch.io/we-are-not-alone)

► Play Deadlands (a cool indie game!):  [https://pjel.itch.io/king-of-deadlands-demo](https://pjel.itch.io/king-of-deadlands-demo) 

► Feedback Quest: [https://itch.io/jam/feedback-quest-4](https://itch.io/jam/feedback-quest-4)

► Twitter: https://twitter.com/NotAlone_Game

► Twitter (personal): https://twitter.com/drewidgames


Music: The Urban Groove - Hanu Dixit
